name: OpenWheel
blurb: Build your own race car! Create a racing team! Become a legend!

rewards.reward: No Reward

OPENWHEEL SUPPORTER
=============================



We are sincerely grateful that you are backing our game.  As a supporter you will have access to the OpenWheel development forum and a thank you in the game credits.

EARLY BIRD

=============================
You get a limited edition digital copy of the game a day before the official release. Also includes the "Early Bird" badge for your cars, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a thank you in the game credits.

RACER
=============================


You get a digital copy of the GAME a day before the official release.  Also includes the "I'm a Backer" in-game badge for your cars, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a thank you in the game credits.

CoLDSToRAGE
=============================

You get a digital copy of the orginal game SOUNDTRACK by CoLDSToRAGE.  Also includes the "CoLDSToRAGE" in-game badge for your cars, a digital copy of the game a day before release, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a thank you from Tim in the game credits.

MORNING PRACTICE

=============================

Access to BETA builds of the game. Get into the action a three months before release! Also includes the "Official Test Driver" in-game badge for your cars, a digital copy of the final game a day before release, digital copy of the original game soundtrack, access to the OpenWheel development forum and listing as a beta tester in the game credits.

PROTOTYPE PILOT

=============================

Access to ALPHA builds of the game.  Get into the action a full four months before release and help shape the OpenWheel experience! Also includes the "Prototype Pilot" in-game badge for your cars, access to Beta builds, a digital copy of the final game a day before release, digital copy of the original game soundtrack, access to the OpenWheel development forum and listing as an alpha tester in the game credits.

WINGMAN

=============================

TWO copies of the game a day before release. Also includes the "Official Test Driver" and "Wingman" in-game badge for your cars, access to Beta builds for two, access to the OpenWheel development forum for two and listings as Beta testers in the game credits.

UNDER THE HOOD
=============================

You get a digital copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, which will include not just great artwork, but also tutorials and breakdowns of how we put the game together. Also includes the "Under The Hood" in-game badge for your cars, a digital copy of the game a day before release, OpenWheel poster, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a thank you in the game credits.

INSIGNIA
=============================

DESIGN a team insignia that will be used in the game! Also includes the "Designer" in-game badge for your cars, a digital copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, dedicated to you, with your insignia design included in the artbook itself, a digital copy of the game a day before release, OpenWheel poster, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a thank you in the game credits.

GRANDSTAND VIEW
=============================

You IN THE CROWD at the race tracks! We will put you in the grandstands. Also includes the "Look out for me!" in-game badge for your cars, a digital copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, which you will also appear in, a digital copy of the game a day before release, OpenWheel poster, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a thank you in the game credits.

COLLECTOR'S EDITION
=============================

You get a physical copy of the game, a physical copy of the soundtrack, a hardcover artbook, T-shirt, poster and metal OpenWheel badge! Also includes the "Collector" in-game badge for your cars, a digital copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, access to Beta builds, access to the OpenWheel development forum and listing as Beta tester in the game credits.

TEAM PRINCIPAL
=============================

FOUR copies of the game a day before release AND design your own team insignia exclusive to you and your team! Also includes the "Official Test Driver" and "Wingman" and "Team Leader" in-game badges for your cars, a digital copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, access to Beta builds for four, access to the OpenWheel development forum for four and listings as Beta testers in the game credits.

TAG THE ROAD =============================\r\nPut your mark permanently on the tarmac! You get a 10 meter by 5 meter space on the tarmac of one of the tracks to write 'almost' anything you want! Send us either the text you want written or an image you want put on the road and our artists will work with you to get it there. Certain profanity and copyright rules will be in place for this one, but we'll work with you to ensure everyone is happy with the result. Also includes "Grafitti Artist" in-game badge for your cars, a digital copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, which your tag will also appear in, a digital copy of the game a day before release, access to BETA builds of the game, an OpenWheel poster, T-Shirt and metal badge, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a listing in the game credits as a 'Tagger'.

BANNER SPONSOR =============================\r\nTWO trackside BANNERS to brand or put your own message on. Promote yourself with a couple of trackside banners. These banners will appear at every track and so your message is guaranteed to be seen. Our artists will work with you to ensure your banner is just right. Also includes "Trackside Sponsor" in-game badge for your cars, a digital copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, dedicated to you, which your banner will also appear in, a digital copy of the game a day before release, access to BETA builds of the game, an OpenWheel poster, T-Shirt and metal badge, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a listing in the game credits as a 'Banner Sponsor'.

BIG TAG THE ROAD =============================\r\nPut your mark permanently on the tarmac - in a big way! You get a 25 meter by 5 meter space on the tarmac of one of the tracks to put you message or image! Works just like TAG THE ROAD reward but on a bigger scale. Also includes "Urban Legend" in-game badge for your cars, a digital copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, dedicated to you, which your tag will also appear in, a physical copy of the game, a physical copy of the soundtrack, access to BETA builds of the game, an OpenWheel poster, T-Shirt and metal badge, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a listing in the game credits as a 'Big Tagger'.

BILLBOARD SPONSOR =============================\r\nOne trackside BILLBOARD to brand or put your own message on.  Your billboard will appear at every track and so your message is guaranteed to be seen, just like the banners - only BIGGER. Our artists will work with you to ensure your billboard is just right. Also includes "Major Message" in-game badge for your cars, a digital copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, dedicated to you, which your billboard will also appear in, a physical copy of the game, a physical copy of the soundtrack, access to BETA builds of the game, an OpenWheel poster, T-Shirt and metal badge, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a listing in the game credits as a 'Billboard Sponsor'.

WHEEL DESIGNER  =============================\r\nDesign an ALLOY WHEEL that will be used in the game! Working with our artists you will create your own design for a wheel that can be selected by racers and used on thier cars. The wheel will be branded just for you. Also includes "Rolling Artwork" in-game badge for your cars, a physical copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, dedicated to you, which your billboard will also appear in, a physical copy of the game, also dedicated to you, a physical copy of the soundtrack, access to BETA builds of the game, an OpenWheel poster, T-Shirt and metal badge, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a listing in the game credits as a 'Wheel Designer'.

IMMORTALISED =============================\r\nNAME A CORNER in the game! But not just name it, brand it. You will be able to choose a corner, chicane or straightaway and have it permanently named how you want it. Not only that but your named section will include FOUR trackside BANNERS just for you and a trackside BILLBOARD. Also includes "Immortalised" in-game badge for your cars, a physical copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, dedicated to you, which your section of track will also appear in, a physical copy of the game, also dedicated to you, a physical copy of the soundtrack, access to BETA builds of the game, an OpenWheel poster, T-Shirt and metal badge, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a listing in the game credits as a 'Corner Sponsor'.

UNIQUE CUSTOM HELMET  =============================\r\nDesign your own PERSONAL HELMET and our artists will build it for you!  It will be tied to your game account so the helmet will be unique to you. Your only limit is pretty much your imagination... and the fact that it has to fit in the cars, but our artists will help with that.Also includes "Unique" in-game badge for your cars, a physical copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, dedicated to you, which your helmet and the design process it went through will appear in, a physical copy of the game, also dedicated to you, a physical copy of the soundtrack, access to BETA builds of the game, an OpenWheel poster, T-Shirt and metal badge, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a listing in the game credits as a 'VIP'.

BRANDED TRACK BRIDGE  =============================\r\nDESIGN YOUR OWN track bridge that appear at all of the tracks! Our artists will work with you to create your own track bridge that will act as a LANDMARK on the Openwheel tracks. Includes FOUR trackside BANNERS and a trackside BILLBOARD. Also includes "Landmark" in-game badge for your cars, a physical copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, dedicated to you, which your bridge,banners and billboard and the design process they went through will appear in, a physical copy of the game, also dedicated to you, a physical copy of the soundtrack, access to BETA builds of the game, an OpenWheel poster, T-Shirt and metal badge, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a listing in the game credits as a 'Landmark Sponsor'.

TILKE FOR A DAY =============================\r\nDESIGN A SECTION OF TRACK! This is the ultimate personalisation opportunity. Our artists will work with you to design a 500 meter section of one of the tracks. We will talk to you about exactly what you would like to create and work closely with you to bring it to reality. Whether you want an iconic corner, tricky chicane or heart stopping crest we will be able to make it happen. Decide where the walls go, if there is a run-off, grandstands or a special feature like a tower or monument. Includes the naming and branding of any features within your section of track, FOUR trackside BANNERS and TWO trackside BILLBOARDS.Also includes "Track Designer" in-game badge for your cars, a physical copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, dedicated to you, which your section of track and the design process it went through will appear in, a physical copy of the game, also dedicated to you, a physical copy of the soundtrack, access to BETA builds of the game, an OpenWheel poster, T-Shirt and metal badge, access to the OpenWheel development forum and a listing in the game credits as a 'Track Designer'.

RESEARCH DAY  =============================\r\nSpend a day at OULTON PARK with the dev team DRIVING A REAL single seat race car! After a day on the track have dinner with the team, see the studio and do some online racing. Includes design your own PERSONAL HELMET and our artists will build it for you, NAME A CORNER in the game with FOUR trackside BANNERS just for you and a trackside BILLBOARD. Put your mark permanently on the tarmac - in a big way with a BIG TAG THE ROAD. FOUR copies of the game a day before release AND design your own team insignia exclusive to you and your team! Also includes "Real Racer" in-game badge for your cars, a physical copy of the making of OpenWheel ARTBOOK, dedicated to you, which will include a diary of your day spent with the team, a physical copy of the game, also dedicated to you, a physical copy of the soundtrack, access to BETA builds of the game, an OpenWheel poster, T-Shirt and metal badge, access to the OpenWheel development forum, a special listing in the game credits as a 'Legend'. AND... A STATUE of you built by our artists and placed where you want it at one of our tracks (behind the barriers of course).
